title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3072/90 of 22 October 1990 again amending articles 6 and 17 of the Protocol concerning the concept of 'originating products' and methods of administrative Cooperation to the Cooperation Agreement between the European economic community and the Kingdom of morocco
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EEC) No 3072/90  of 22 October 1990  again amending Articles 6 and 17 of the Protocol concerning the concept of 'originating products' and methods of administrative cooperation to the Cooperation Agreement between the European  Economic Community and the Kingdom of Morocco
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 November 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 22 October 1990.
For the Council
The President
G. DE MICHELIS
(1) OJ No L 264, 27. 9. 1978, p. 2.
(2) OJ No L 264, 27. 9. 1978, p. 38.
(3) OJ No L 71, 14. 3. 1986, p. 2.
